From: Anila Varghese <anila.varghese@unic-nasco.com> 
Sent: Monday, December 23, 2024 11:30 AM
To: Uttam Khutale <Uttam.Khutale@nascodubai.com>; Anil Kumar <Anil.Kumar@nascodubai.com>
Cc: Amine Azzi <amine.azzi@unic-aiaw.com>; Regi Themalil Varghese <regi.varghese@unic-aiaw.com>; Pradeep Poojary <pradeep.poojary@unic-nasco.com>
Subject: Guest Villa floor issue - Patrick Chalhoub-Villa number 30)

 

Restricted

 

Dear Uttam/Mr. Kumar,

 

 

A new claim has been reported under the policy of Patrick Chalhoub where the Insured is claiming for  guest villa floor (Villa number 30).

 

*	Intially they states that the claim occurred this year in Feb however they did not check then. 
*	Later on, they changed the statement saying that they noticed the loss same time as the previous claim but only one claim was reported. 
*	When we enquiried on the occupancy of  the premises at the time of incident in /Feb 2024 , they stated that no one was living there at that time. 
*	Later It was stated that the premises was not fully vacant at any time. There has always been a regular attendance from the staff and from the Chalhoub

 

 

Unfortunately we are unable to entertain such claims wherein Insured is providing vague information and contradicting their statements. Moreover the claim was occurred way back in Feb 2024, Hence we are unable to assist the Insured further.

 

Please advise the Insured and take it forward from your end.

 

 

 

Thanks and regards

 

 

Anila Varghese

Senior Assistant Manager – General Claims
